title: WARP Graphs: A Worldline Algebra for Recursive Provenance
description: This paper introduces A Worldline Algebra for Recursive Provenance graphs (WARPs): recursively nested, typed open graphs forming the foundational state model of the AIΩN computer. We develop an inductive definition, categorical semantics, morphisms, and recursion principles, connecting WARPs to adhesive graph rewriting and establishing them as the base object for deterministic multiway computation developed in Papers II–VI of the AIΩN Foundations Series.
